values: I wish I knew where my best friend went.

This 9/11 crap really needs to stop being on tv, especially all day long til 12am the next day.  They replay the same video clips, the same phone calls, they say the same things they said for the past 5 years.  There really isn't anything new that can be added as the years go on.  Have a memorial show for about an hour, honor people who died, and leave it at that.  The media has a serious problem with dragging something out and just never letting it die down.  I don't think people who lost someone that day wants to turn on the TV and see nothing but that AAAALLLL DDDDAAAYYY LLLOOONNNGGG....We really don't need 24 hours of televised video clips of the towers falling down.  That doesn't make people, "never forget what happened", that just makes people upset/pissed off.

Yea...i just got 4 teeth pulled.



...this feels....awesome.
I'm really starting to get tired of this crap.

Just as the Cingular commercial for less dropped calls ends...my cell phone...drops the call.  


And yea, I have Cingular.

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-8260059923762628848&q=911

It's really long, and maybe you just don't care about this topic....but it's really fucking creepy watching this and realizing that maybe this entire thing...was a setup.  I seriously got chills, the entire video.  I would really really suggest watching it.
Amaretto Liqueur is an almond and bitter cherry flavoured liqueur I knew I wasn't crazy when I would add amaretto creamer to my coffee, that it strangley tasted alittle like cherries...

What I'd like to say is that it's nice to find out who gives an actual fuck about you on your birthday and who doesn't.  I'd like to thank Brian, Taso and Maria for coming out to dinner with me tonight and making me feel nice on my birthday and for Zach for calling me at 12 and continuously thoughout the day wishing me a happy birthday and for everyone else who left messages on my lj and myspace.  I'd also like to thank Taso and Maria for being there for me both nights I celebrated and staying with me for about the whole day, each day.  And then there's a thanks for that certain person who felt the need to not see me not one but both days.  You had more than enough of an excuse to not see me today, but there really was no excuse to not see me yesterday when you knew we were celebrating since I knew we weren't gonna have alot of time to do it tonight.  So thanks for that.  So next year, are you perhaps considering going for a 3rd shot at missing my birthday in a row?  Cause last year didn't bother me as much, we weren't that close.  But just to let you know, this year, it hurt.  I guess getting high with your friends yesterday must of been more important than a friends birthday.  Pretty funny since going out to dinner was your idea and you weren't there for either.


Once again, to everyone else who actually made the effort to see me on my birthday...thanks.  It's good to know you actually give a fuck. 

<3

Peta videos usually do 2 out of 3 things:

Make me feel sick
Make me start to cry
Make me hate people that much more than i already do.

Almost put my fist through a wall and my foot up someones ass.


I need to get away from stupid people.

And yes...this time has proven to me that you ARE a stupid person...


edit: and btw...why the fuck should I care about you when obviously you don't care one fucking bit about what your "best friends" think, but seem to care what scumbag thinks?  I'm done with giving a shit about what happens to you.  If you're stupid enough to wanna stick around for someone who's "depressed" just cause he hasn't seen you one day and isn't just happy at the fact that he has you, then that's what you deserve. I tried showing you you deserved so much better and I thought maybe you were starting to see that, but I guess you must think pretty low of yourself if you think this is what you deserve.  


Have a great life with a cheating past, a crazy ex-gf, lying, and some guilt trips to come.

That was the best show I've ever been to...and probably the best that I'll EVER have been to.
Heaven and Hell... ...and the Sun and the Moon. Pictures cannot begin to explain how fucking awesome this show really was.
I hope that everynight before you go to bed, you remember that you don't deserve her and you never will.  Like you said best, white trash deserves white trash.

If ppl wanna know what's "up my ass", i'll let you know it's the fact that 2 ppl I care about obviously have no brain inside their heads and are doing one of the stupidest possible thing.  Just a word of advice to both. People don't change and this time isn't gonna be any different.

I want an apartment off the island, with a cat and maybe a dog.  I wanna get married, have a good job, have a family, stop having to hear about teenage drama bullshit until it's my kids teenage drama bullshit. I wanna live my cozy life, with my cozy cat and a cozy husband, away from stupid crap and stupid people. And I want that soon.

O'Sailor, why'd ya do it?
What'd ya do that for?
Wooo.  My tax return is 574.  Sweeeeeeet.
The only cunt here, is you. Can't Understand Normal Thinking It's sad I once thought you were a decent person.
It's sad when people don't see what's right in front of them.
Phoney people come to pray, Look at all of them beg to stay, Phoney people come to pray.

"yesterday i went to school, during 7th nick and zach played w. the dead dog which was actually a dead cat, such a disappointment. then after school, we took mikes car to the mall for alittle while. i fear ever hangingout w. them again..." Haha, read that in my old journal.
This year and 4 months crap is killing me.  Come home so I can keep the little bit of sanity I have left.

Dear Santa...

Dear Santa,

This year I've been busy!

In July and I robbed a bank (-50 points). Last Friday I set 's puppy on fire (-66 points). Last Wednesday I gave a kidney (1000 points). In January I pushed in the mud (-17 points). In April I didn't flush (-1 points).

Overall, I've been nice (866 points). For Christmas I deserve a toy train!

Sincerely,
void_of_hate

Write your letter to Santa! Enter your LJ username:
Somehow, apparently just by giving Zach one of my kidneys, it erases the fact that I robbed a bank, set a puppy on fire and I pushed Jimmy in the mud.

Taco bell on Hempstead tpke has been now dubbed suck ass.  This is the 2nd day in a row this week they fucked up my order.  How hard is it to understand no tomato, extra sour cream? It doesn't mean no tomato/no sour cream, and it also doesn't mean extra tomato, no sour cream.

Sometimes the saying "blood is thicker than water" falls alittle short.  That's pretty dick if you ask me.
Scratch the last post.  We're keeping her.  She's my new Mattie cat :P

Hoookay. Soo here's the deal. My mom found an itty bitty kitten today at my aunts house in the woods. The thing looks like it's a few weeks old if even. It's real sweet and we're asking around first before calling a shelter to see if anyone wants a kitten. Don't know if it's a boy or a girl though cause it's so small to tell yet. If there IS anyone who wants a kitten, just let me know by sometime tomorrow...pleeeeease. THANKS!
He's saying "Pwease take me home." Awh...go on, take him home.

Well my plans for my day off today were thrown out the window.  Was suppose to get up, go shopping, come back home, tan alittle, go to the beach by 4 with Zach and Garrett, come home.  But it seems that today, unlike yesterday and the day before, the sun decided to take a day off as well.  FUCK YOU SUN.  Was beautiful yesterday and the day before, and the first day I have off in 8 days, is shitty and rainy.  Seriously, wtf.


If it's sunny tomorrow, I'm ripping someones face off.

Art History - B 2D Design - B Drawing - A Biology - A Sem. Average: 3.54 :) I'm satisfied. PS. - I LOVE this song. PPS. - My computer is fixed thanks to 3 hours of my brother working on it. :D

Well this week kinda stinks.  First off my computer has crapped out due to a virus I have no idea how I got.  There was orignally 3, Norton got rid of 2 of them and there's still one in there that I think attached to an important file.  Sometimes my computer will turn on, sometimes it goes to that blue screen.  I'm hoping that at least one more time it'll go back to Windows so I can at least save whatever I can, like my pictures and music, before my brother will most likely have to wipe out Windows and reinstall it.  And Secondly, I found out from my dad, that one of my aunts has a cancerous tumor behind her ribcage and they've been doing tests to see what they came do.  Other than that, things have been going their usual self.  Lol I got my first credit card which can be good or bad.  I'm just hoping my report card comes soon cause I have a feeling I did decently well and if I did, that means I can take it to the insurance company and get my insurance knocked down alittle more. Woo.

Ok this is really starting to bug the hell out of me and next time someone does it, I'm gonna punch em in the face.  With the exception of Maria, because she knows why, don't go out of your way to make plans with someone, then, oh wow.  No phone call for the rest of the night, or let's make plans to hangout with someone after school and then it's almost 4:30 and no one's called yet.  Stop making people wait around for you to finally decide you wanna call someone, especially since, hmmm, Idk...not like any of you really have cars to drive yourself over somewhere, so I WONDER who would have to come pick you up..oh yea..me.  Don't waste my time waiting around for you to finally decide to hangout or to not even have the fucking respect to call and let someone know you're not gonna hangout or something came up.  Don't wanna give me that respect? Then don't call me, IM me, or ask me to hangout, because the answer will be no.  Don't waste my time, I have better things to do with it than waste it waiting for someone who doesn't even fucking care.  Signing off.  Suck my DICK.

PS- Oh and an added bonus I've always loved is when then someone can find the time for someone else the next day, or even that day.

<lj-cut text=+:Ha.I.stole.this.biznatch.from.Maria...:+>
WRATH

1. Who did you last get angry with? Probably Zach, lol

2. What is your weapon of choice? My witty back-sass ;)

3. Would you hit a member of the opposite sex? Yea

4. How about of the same sex? Yea

5. Who was the last person who got really angry at you? lol Maria

6. What is your pet peeve? Hmmm...too many to even compute at the moment..I'll get bad to you on that. Actually one is when people critize and accuse people of doing what they do best ;)

7. Do you keep grudges or can you let them go easily? lol I hold grudges.


SLOTH


1. What is one thing you're supposed to do daily that you haven't done in a long time? shower.  Nah jk.  lol take my medicine for my cold I had like 2 weeks ago.  It was suppose to be finished a long time ago but I never finish my medicines.

2. What is the latest you've ever woken up? Damn...I think the most I ever slept was like 15 hrs, but I can't remember when and what time I woke up.

3. Name a person you've been meaning to contact, but haven't: probably Kerri

4. What is the last lame excuse you made? lol Probably something to get out of class, haha I told one of my teachers that I needed to go home bc my little brother was home alone and didn't have a key to get into the house.  I don't even have a little brother.

5. Have you ever watched an infomercial all the way through? haha, yes and I was actually tempted to buy on

6. When was the last time you got a good workout in? Everyday for the past month.  That I'm actually proud of, I've been eating so much better lately, very little to no fast food, and exercising every day.

7. How many times did you hit the snooze button on your alarm clock today? hahaha, actually I have 2 time setting buttons on my alarm clock.  I set it normally for 9 and then 9:05.  Today for the 9:05 I hit it twice and ended up waking up at like 9:20.  Needless to say, I was alittle late to work today.  Just by like a minute though, cause I got skiiiills...


GLUTTONY

1. What is your overpriced yuppie beverage of choice? lol yuppie?

2. Meat eaters: white meat or dark meat? Dark meat all the fucking way.  White meat is way too fucking dry.

3. What is the greatest amount of alcohol you've had in one sitting/outing/event? Maybe like 6-8 shots of vodka.  I didn't even barf either.  I hold my liquor well :)

4. Have you ever used a professional diet company? No

5. Do you have an issue with your weight? Weight? Not at all.  I weigh 110 and that's pretty normal for my height.  The only problem I have is I don't like the little extra on my tummy, but that's what exercising is for.

6. Do you prefer sweets, salty foods, or spicy foods? Alittle of each I guess.  Too much sweets hurt my teeth, too much salty just taste poopy, and then spicy foods,..eh, I don't really care for too much.

7. Have you ever looked at a small house pet or child and thought LUNCH!!! Nope, can't say I have.

LUST

1. How many people have you seen naked (not counting movies/family": I try not to keep count, lol.  Mostly it's a frightening sight.

2. How many people have seen YOU naked (not counting physicians/family): a few I guess.

3. Have you ever caught yourself staring at the chest/crotch of a member of your gender of choice during a normal conversation? That's right...I did.

4. Have you "done it?" Oh yea baby :P

5. What is your favorite body part on a person of your gender of choice? Eyes :D

6. Have you ever been propositioned by a prostitute? No

7. Have you ever been tested for an STD or pregnancy? Nope

GREED


1. How many credit cards do you own? None...yet.

2. What's your guilty pleasure store? Haha, clothes stores :P

3. If you had $1 million, what would you do with it? I'd help my parents pay their bills, probably get my car fixed and put the rest in the bank.

4. Would you rather be rich or famous? Idk..probably rich.  Being famous means giving your privacy away.

5. Would you accept a boring job if it meant you would make megabucks? Lol, maybe..I worked as a secretary and made 10 an hr and that was a pretty boring job.

6. Have you ever stolen anything? Yea.  Your moms virginity OH.

7. Five things that you would never give up? Idk..stuff


PRIDE


1. What one thing have you done that you're most proud of? The fact that I'm doing awesome in school right now.  I have an A in bio.  The last time I had an A in school was in elementry school.

2. What one thing have you done that your friends are most proud of? Idk

3. What thing would you like to accomplish in your life? I guess do good careerwise.

4. Do you get annoyed by coming in second place? Eh, depends on some things.  I kinda live by the fact that there's always gonna someone who does better than you.

5. Have you ever entered a contest of skill, knowing you were of much higher skill than all the other competitors? No

6. Have you ever cheated on something to get a higher score? Lol probably tests in school.

7. What did you do today that you're proud of? I got all my hw in that I missed while I was sick.


ENVY


1. Would you consider yourself the jealous type? At times.

2. What item of your friend's would you most want to have for your own? Probably a better car, lol.

3. Which public or famous figure would you like to be? hmm..

4. If you could be anyone else in the world for a day who would you be? A guy.  Just to have a weenier.

5. Who would you want to go on "Trading Spaces" with? Your mom. :D

6. Have you ever wished you had a physical feature different from your own? Eh probably just my stomach, everything else I'm fine with.

7. What inborn trait do you see in others that you wish you had for yourself? Bitchiness.  Oh Wait...I already have that :D
Little word of advice.  Whether you're my friend or not, you say something about any of my friends, I will bite your fucking head off.  :D

Cause Penny and Me like to roll the windows down
Turn the radio up, push the pedal to the ground
And Penny and Me like to gaze at starry skies
Close our eyes, pretend to fly

haha...Gotta love Hanson

Fuck you all.  Don't make me feel bad for not driving people to somewhere no matter what the circumstances are.  FUCK YOU, I'M NOT YOUR FUCKING TAXI.  I drive you people around and most of the time I never see a fucking dime.  Especially from those of you who have a job and can well afford throwing 5 stinkin bucks my way for gas since I can bring you here, there and everywhere.  The only people I expect nothing from is Brian and Mike bc they drive me in their car.  I'm too nice of a person to ever ask any of you for money, but it never runs across anyones mind to say "Hey gee, maybe since Melissa is bringing me somewhere, maybe I should throw a few bucks her way, especially since she's out of a job" Now I'm getting the fucking guilty trip, THE FUCKING GUILTY TRIP from my best friend and I'm left to feel fucking bad for not wanting to drive, cause it's not like I don't drive all the fucking time with you guys, why bc those of you who are 18 or old enough don't have a license?  Why the FUCK should I have to go out of my way bc you're all too fucking lazy to get one?  Me driving you guys is a privlage, not a chore.  At least it shouldn't be, but it feels like lately that's all it is.  I get to feel bad, enough that I'm crying now that's how much like shit I feel bc my best friend gives me the sarcastic "Thanks alot" and my bf doesn't say anything bc he has to "stay out of it", while he was too fucking lazy a yr ago to get one, and by 18 only has his permit still?  Don't sit there and make me feel bad for not driving people somewhere when it's not my responsibility to.  You are not my fucking children, I am not your mommy or daddy, I do NOT have to bring you anywhere, but I do bc I love you guys, but lately all I've been feeling is USED.  Like all I am is a fucking taxi to you guys.  I AM NOT YOUR FUCKING CHAUFFEUR.  Why should I have to jump when one of you needs a ride somewhere or need to get dropped off at someone elses house or school or work.  Don't make me feel bad for not wanting to be responsible for someone's brother in my car either.  It's my car, making me responsible for the people in it.  God forbid something happen, it's my fault.  Remember a year ago, I already got into an accident and I was responsible for the 3 other people in that car that night, and it would of been my fault if something worse would of happened that night.  It's bad enough I have to drive you guys around and be responsible for you, but I don't need everyone in their brother and sister and cousins in my car, I don't need the added responsiblity.  And bc of that, since I won't drive them somewhere, don't give me the guilty trip bc they don't have a fucking ride there.  IT IS NOT MY RESPONSIBILTY TO DRIVE ANYONE ANWHERE.  Maybe when you guys start to realize that and I stop feeling like I'm nothing but a cab to you guys, then the rides will start happening again, til then, you can all walk.  I'm tired of being your fucking taxi ride, I'm your friend, not your fucking bitch.

Oh yea. Hanson is awesome. 

And since when did Taylor get married and have a kid?? WTf?!
Haha, I just realized while looking at pictures that I have a BIG nose.  It doesn't work well with my face.  Oh poo, too bad I don't believe in plastic surgery, ha.
